H0.text: Remission is the cure of cancer known as.

H1.text: Metabolism is the cure of cancer known as.

H2.text: Rejuvenation is the cure of cancer.

H3.text: Regeneration is the cure of cancer known as.

A4.text: In cancer-treatment, doctors usually avoid the term 'cured' and instead prefer the term 'no evidence of disease' (NED) to refer to a complete remission of cancer, which does not rule out the possibility of relapse.
